data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahmed, Raja Ben, Bielecki, Aleksander, Cichocka, Joanna M., Tekaya, Saïda, Gorzel, Małgorzata, Harrath, Abdul Halim (2013): Erpobdellid leeches (Annelida, Clitellata, Hirudinida) from Tunisia: New records with the description of a new Trocheta species. Zootaxa 3681 (4): 440-454, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.4.7
